title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The Park offers Teaching With Historic Places Lesson Plan: Minuteman Missile Protecting A Legacy of the Cold War. This Lesson Plan helps students put the Minuteman Missile's arrival on the Great Plains into the context of the Space Race and Cold War. All Curriculum Materials   Featured Lesson Plan    Minuteman Missile National: Protecting a Legacy of the Cold War Learn More     Field Trips Minuteman Missile National Historic Site welcomes school groups for ranger-guided tours of the site. Depending on class size, students can tour Launch Control Facility Delta-01 and/or Launch Facility (missile silo) Delta-09! All Field Trips   Field Trip    Take A Top Secret Field Trip Learn More     Guest Speakers Minuteman Missile offers area South Dakota schools the opportunity to have a ranger visit their classroom.  All Guest Speakers   Guest Speakers    Ranger In Your Classroom Learn More
